osx.command: rm -rf build; mkdir build; cd build; c++ /System/Library/Frameworks/GLUT.framework/GLUT /System/Library/Frameworks/OpenGL.framework/OpenGL ${workspaceRoot}/src/*.cpp -o tetris3d.app

linux.command: rm -rf build; mkdir build; cd build; g++ -g -I ${workspaceRoot}/include/ ${workspaceRoot}/src/cpp/*.cpp -lGL -lGLEW -lglfw -o opengl-app
